perturbation.original_text: The parties intend to negotiate in good faith and resolve any dispute arising under this Agreement. In the event the parties are unable to resolve any such dispute to binding arbitration for settlement in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association, the arbitrator will determine the manner in which the parties are to pay the costs of such arbitration, including reasonable attorneys' fees
perturbation.changed_text: The parties intend to negotiate in good faith and resolve any dispute arising under this Agreement. In the event the parties are unable to resolve any such dispute, the arbitrator will determine the manner in which the parties are to pay the costs of such arbitration, including reasonable attorneys' fees to binding arbitration for settlement in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association.
perturbation.explanation: The arbitration clause, initially intended to be binding, is altered by placing it in a section unrelated to dispute resolution and changing the sentence order, it suggests that arbitration only applies if negotiation fails. By reversing the sentence, the binding nature is weakened.

perturbation.original_text: Erchonia DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS.
perturbation.changed_text: Erchonia DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS. WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
perturbation.explanation: Moving essential warranty disclaimers to be located in the middle of the sentence diminishes their visibility and enforceability, potentially violating consumer protection laws requiring conspicuous disclaimers.
perturbation.location: 10. WarrantyÍ¾ Limitation of Liability. b. Erchonia Warranty and Warranty Limitations:

perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall at all times comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor shall at all times comply with all regulations and occasionally with applicable laws.
perturbation.explanation: By modifying the sentence, it is implied that compliance with applicable laws is not mandatory, which is a legal contradiction.
